docstring.long_description:
The file currently can only be located in the instruments C drive (C:/)

Requires a CONNECT_MSO2X block to create the connection.

Tested on MSO22 and MSO24.
docstring.short_description: Saves or recalls a instrument setup file (.set).

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_MSO2X block).

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The file name to save or recall (e.g. c:/flojoy.set).

videos.title: Control Tektronix MSO Oscilloscope with Flojoy
